description: A container for a single allowable parameter combination.

element.comments: If a search combination is specified, clients should expect that they must submit that required combination or the search will be unsuccesful. If multiple search parameter combinations are specified, a client may pick between them, and supply the minimal required parameters for any of the combinations.
element.definition: A container for a single allowable parameter combination.
A search parameter name in the combination which is required.
element.name: required

element.comments: If a defined parameter is not listed as a required or optional parameter, the implication is that the parameter is not supported with this combination. Servers may ignore It, though some may return an error if it is used.
element.definition: A search parameter name in the combination which is optional.
element.name: optional

name: An allowable parameter combination
publisher: Health Level Seven, Inc. - [WG Name] WG

element.comments: If a search combination is specified, clients should expect that they must submit that required combination or the search will be unsuccesful. If multiple search parameter combinations are specified, a client may pick between them, and supply the minimal required parameters for any of the combinations.
element.definition: A container for a single allowable parameter combination.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).
A search parameter name in the combination which is required.
element.name: required

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition should be version specific.  This will ideally be the URI for the Resource Profile defining the extension, with the code for the extension after a #.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension

element.definition: Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).
